Class FreeChartGraph

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  uk.ac.liv.auction.stats.FreeChartGraph
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, AuctionEventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
MultipleSeriesGraph, SupplyAndDemandGraph
public abstract class FreeChartGraph
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements AuctionEventListener

a JFreeChart graph that can be included in a FreeChartReport.

Parameters

base.name
string
base.width
int 		(the width of the graph and 350 by default)
base.height
int 		(the height of the graph and 300 by default)

Version:
$Revision$
Author:
Jinzhong Niu
